item.title: Shakuntala Devi - A week of Puzzles
item.description:
“Math — it’s a puzzle. I love figuring out puzzles.” — said Maya Lin.

There have been many brilliant women who made history in mathematics, and Shakuntala Devi was one of them. She was a mathematician and writer who amazed the world with her mental calculations. She once solved the 23rd root of a 201-digit number in just 50 seconds, and even multiplied two 13-digit numbers faster than a computer!
